attempt_history.verified_code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem minkowski_inequality_fin {n : ℕ} {p : ℝ} (hp : 1 < p) (u v : Fin n → ℝ)
    (hu : ∀ i, 0 ≤ u i) (hv : ∀ i, 0 ≤ v i) :
    (∑ i, (u i + v i) ^ p) ^ (1 / p) ≤ (∑ i, u i ^ p) ^ (1 / p) + (∑ i, v i ^ p) ^ (1 / p) := by sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
• Let n be a natural number. u and v are sequences of n nonnegative real numbers [tc_1].
• p is a real number such that p > 1 [tc_2].
Therefore, we conclude:
• ∑_{i=1}^n (u_i+v_i)^p = ∑_{i=1}^n u_i(u_i+v_i)^(p-1) + ∑_{i=1}^n v_i(u_i+v_i)^(p-1) [l1].
proof_steps.lean_tactics:
have h₁ : ∑ i, (u i + v i) ^ p =
      ∑ i, u i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) + ∑ i, v i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) := by
    calc
      ∑ i, (u i + v i) ^ p
      _ = ∑ i, (u i + v i) * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) := by
        refine' Finset.sum_congr rfl fun i _ => _
        rcases (add_nonneg (hu i) (hv i)).eq_or_lt with h | h_pos
        · have hui_zero : u i = 0 := by linarith [hu i, hv i, h]
          have hvi_zero : v i = 0 := by linarith [hu i, hv i, h]
          simp [hui_zero, hvi_zero]
          rw [Real.zero_rpow (by linarith [hp]), mul_zero]
        · rw [mul_comm, ← Real.rpow_add_one h_pos.ne']
          congr
          ring
      _ = ∑ i, (u i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) + v i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1)) := by
        simp_rw [add_mul]
      _ = ∑ i, u i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) + ∑ i, v i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) := by
        rw [Finset.sum_add_distrib]

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem minkowski_inequality_fin {n : ℕ} {p : ℝ} (hp : 1 < p) (u v : Fin n → ℝ)
    (hu : ∀ i, 0 ≤ u i) (hv : ∀ i, 0 ≤ v i) :
    (∑ i, (u i + v i) ^ p) ^ (1 / p) ≤ (∑ i, u i ^ p) ^ (1 / p) + (∑ i, v i ^ p) ^ (1 / p) := by
  have : ∑ i, (u i + v i) ^ p =
      ∑ i, u i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) + ∑ i, v i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) :=
    calc
      ∑ i, (u i + v i) ^ p
      _ = ∑ i, (u i + v i) * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) := by
        refine' Finset.sum_congr rfl fun i _ => _
        rcases (add_nonneg (hu i) (hv i)).eq_or_lt with h | h_pos
        · rw [h]
          simp [zero_rpow (by linarith : p > 0), zero_rpow (by linarith : 0 < p - 1)]
        · rw [← Real.rpow_one, ← Real.rpow_add h_pos, add_sub_cancel]
      _ = ∑ i, (u i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) + v i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1)) := by
        simp_rw [add_mul]
      _ = _ := by rw [Finset.sum_add_distrib]
  sorry

    _ = _ := by rw [Finset.sum_add_distrib]
  sorry

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem minkowski_inequality_fin {n : ℕ} {p : ℝ} (hp : 1 < p) (u v : Fin n → ℝ)
    (hu : ∀ i, 0 ≤ u i) (hv : ∀ i, 0 ≤ v i) :
    (∑ i, (u i + v i) ^ p) ^ (1 / p) ≤ (∑ i, u i ^ p) ^ (1 / p) + (∑ i, v i ^ p) ^ (1 / p) := by
  have : ∑ i, (u i + v i) ^ p =
      ∑ i, u i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) + ∑ i, v i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) := by
    calc
      ∑ i, (u i + v i) ^ p
      _ = ∑ i, (u i + v i) * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) := by
        refine' Finset.sum_congr rfl fun i _ => _
        rcases (add_nonneg (hu i) (hv i)).eq_or_lt with h | h_pos
        · have hui_zero : u i = 0 := by linarith [hu i, hv i, h]
          have hvi_zero : v i = 0 := by linarith [hu i, hv i, h]
          simp [hui_zero, hvi_zero]
        · rw [mul_comm, ← Real.rpow_add_one h_pos.ne']
          congr
          ring
      _ = ∑ i, (u i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) + v i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1)) := by
        simp_rw [add_mul]
      _ = ∑ i, u i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) + ∑ i, v i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) := by
        rw [Finset.sum_add_distrib]
  sorry

Therefore, we conclude:
• q * (p - 1) = p [l2].

• u and v are sequences of n nonnegative real numbers [tc_1].

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem minkowski_inequality_fin {n : ℕ} {p : ℝ} (hp : 1 < p) (u v : Fin n → ℝ)
    (hu : ∀ i, 0 ≤ u i) (hv : ∀ i, 0 ≤ v i) :
    (∑ i, (u i + v i) ^ p) ^ (1 / p) ≤ (∑ i, u i ^ p) ^ (1 / p) + (∑ i, v i ^ p) ^ (1 / p) := by
 have h₁ : ∑ i, (u i + v i) ^ p =
      ∑ i, u i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) + ∑ i, v i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) := by
    calc
      ∑ i, (u i + v i) ^ p
      _ = ∑ i, (u i + v i) * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) := by
        refine' Finset.sum_congr rfl fun i _ => _
        rcases (add_nonneg (hu i) (hv i)).eq_or_lt with h | h_pos
        · have hui_zero : u i = 0 := by linarith [hu i, hv i, h]
          have hvi_zero : v i = 0 := by linarith [hu i, hv i, h]
          simp [hui_zero, hvi_zero]
          rw [Real.zero_rpow (by linarith [hp]), mul_zero]
        · rw [mul_comm, ← Real.rpow_add_one h_pos.ne']
          congr
          ring
      _ = ∑ i, (u i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) + v i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1)) := by
        simp_rw [add_mul]
      _ = ∑ i, u i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) + ∑ i, v i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) := by
        rw [Finset.sum_add_distrib]

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem minkowski_inequality_fin {n : ℕ} {p : ℝ} (hp : 1 < p) (u v : Fin n → ℝ)
    (hu : ∀ i, 0 ≤ u i) (hv : ∀ i, 0 ≤ v i) :
    (∑ i, (u i + v i) ^ p) ^ (1 / p) ≤ (∑ i, u i ^ p) ^ (1 / p) + (∑ i, v i ^ p) ^ (1 / p) := by
 have h₁ : ∑ i, (u i + v i) ^ p =
      ∑ i, u i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) + ∑ i, v i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) := by
    calc
      ∑ i, (u i + v i) ^ p
      _ = ∑ i, (u i + v i) * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) := by
        refine' Finset.sum_congr rfl fun i _ => _
        rcases (add_nonneg (hu i) (hv i)).eq_or_lt with h | h_pos
        · have hui_zero : u i = 0 := by linarith [hu i, hv i, h]
          have hvi_zero : v i = 0 := by linarith [hu i, hv i, h]
          simp [hui_zero, hvi_zero]
          rw [Real.zero_rpow (by linarith [hp]), mul_zero]
        · rw [mul_comm, ← Real.rpow_add_one h_pos.ne']
          congr
          ring
      _ = ∑ i, (u i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) + v i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1)) := by
        simp_rw [add_mul]
      _ = ∑ i, u i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) + ∑ i, v i * (u i + v i) ^ (p - 1) := by
        rw [Finset.sum_add_distrib]
